column4: hey all how do i set up firestarter to work with amule so i don't get low IP?
why would you want to use a firewall on a system that doesn't have any open ports?
firewalls block open ports - ubuntu has no open ports by default, so there is nowhere for any hacker to break into, thus you should not need a firewall
you don't need a firewall on ubuntu desktop, unless you start installing server-software
